properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO = 2 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO =? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM ADMIN_BOARD_LIST WHERE BOARD_TYPE_NO=? ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
